title: Is Mookie Betts better than Willie Mays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is Andrew McCutchen better than Willie Mays. That is what Mookie Betts is. Compare McCutchen’s 12,13, and 14 seasons with Betts 16,17, and 18 and you have the exact same player. Then look at Willie Mays stats from 54–66. Look at McCutchen’s stats now that is what Betts will turn into.
